parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the soldier assigned to the given vehicle as a gunner.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''assignedGunner''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_gunner = [[assignedGunner]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[assignAsGunner]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[assignAsCommander]], [[assignAsDriver]], [[moveInGunner]], [[moveInTurret]], [[moveInCommander]], [[moveInDriver]], [[gunner]], [[ArmA:_Actions#GetInTurret|GetInTurret]], [[commander]], [[driver]], [[assignAsCargo]], [[moveInCargo]], [[assignedCommander]], [[assignedDriver]]
</value></part></template>
